text: welcome back
ah i wish i had curly hair
did you miss our little tobacco shop, Abigail?
I remember you helping me stock shelves
and chatting with the regulars.
(And the scent of fresh tobacco.)
I love you.
do you have any idea what it's like to see your dreams die
because of a single mistake?
because of a single mistake?
because of a single mistake?
I love you.
I love you.
I tried to love you, I really did.
isn't it a wonderful, bittersweet feeling
when people say we look so much alike?
this is where I feel closest to my old dreams
singing here in church.
it's not the stage I imagined
but it's a stage nonetheless
Yet the cruel, inevitable, and irredeemable truth
is that a mistake is exactly what you are.
